sentences.sentence: I love my job and having the opportunity to work on someone with a rare, neuromuscular disease is a new challenge for me.
sentences.translation: 我喜欢我的工作，能有机会给一个患有某种罕见的神经肌肉疾病的患者进行治疗对我来说是一个新的挑战。

sentences.sentence: In addition to lidocaine, nearly all the local anesthetics have been shown to have this effect on neuromuscular blockade.
sentences.translation: 除了利多卡因以外，几乎所有的局麻药都对非去极化型肌松药产生这样的作用。

sentences.sentence: I have a degree in Neuromuscular Therapy and lots and lots of different certificates from various weekend learning workshops.
sentences.translation: 我有一个神经肌肉治疗方面的学位，还有很多从周末的学习班获得的不同证书。
